x86:instruction.summary: Restrict the Permissions of an EPC Page

tr.td: This leaf function restricts the access rights associated with a EPC page in an initialized enclave.
Address of the destination EPC page (In)

x86:instruction.p: This leaf function restricts the access rights associated with an EPC page in an initialized enclave. THE RWX bits of the SECINFO parameter are treated as a permissions mask; supplying a value that does not restrict the page permissions will have no effect. This instruction can only be executed when current privilege level is 0.

RBX contains the effective address of a SECINFO structure while RCX contains the effective address of an EPC page. The table below provides additional information on the memory parameter of the EMODPR leaf function.
